title: Matplotlib Plot
overviewMarkdown:
## Matplotlib Plot

This plugin allows you to render plots using Matplotlib by executing Python code in real-time. Matplotlib is already loaded, and you can specify additional packages if needed.

openaiSpec.name: render_matplotlib_plot

title.description: The title of the Matplotlib plot to display above the plot.

matplotlib_code.description: The Python code to generate the plot using Matplotlib. Note that Matplotlib is already loaded in this environment. And plt.show() is required in the end.

packages.description: A list of additional Python packages to load before executing the code. Only include packages that are necessary for your calculation.

openaiSpec.description: Render Matplotlib plots using Python code executed in a Pyodide environment.
